message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can negotiate further if you'd like.
Alice, your offer was a bit too much in your favor.  I propose a 60/40 split for me this time.  Considering the inflation, I think this is fair.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45 this time, with me getting the larger share.  It's still a good deal considering the inflation, and I think it shows good faith in finding a solution.
